projects.title: Bookswap React App
projects.description: A React front end project website allowing users to view, borrow, and review books using an api.

projects.title: Blog Post App
projects.description: I created a database and the back end code to form a blog post website which included user registration, adding posts, and liking/disliking posts

projects.title: Quiz application
projects.description: Using laravel and a pre build react front end, I was required to build an API that allows quizzes to be built, with quizzes and answers able to be edited, added, and deleted. The scores for the quizzes can be calculated and returned to be displayed at the front end.
